channel.title: Gauntlet Con 2019 - Thank You!
channel.description:
I won't retype the whole thing here (so that everyone tagged doesn't want to strangle me for tagging them every place I can), but I wanted to share my thank-you Twitter thread for everyone who worked on Gauntlet Con: https://twitter.com/Arr_Roo/status/1189329535860432896
I also wanted to say thanks to @seanFsmith and @RoryM for their generosity in prize support and volunteer rewards. I don't know the two of you on Twitter, but didn't want your generosity to go without saying a very public thanks!
Richard Ruane Gauntlet Con 2019
